Name: SQL Server - Project Deployment Model - Deploy ISPAC
Description: This is to deploy ssis packages using 'project deployment model' (ISPAC file )
Author: dorasaa

Parameters.Name: ISPAC_FILE_PATH
Parameters.Label: Ispac file path
Parameters.HelpText: Once the SSIS project is compiled "ispac" file gets created, this variable must hold the path of the ispac file.

Parameters.Name: deploy.dts.server
Parameters.Label: SSIS Server name
Parameters.HelpText: SSIS Server name where this ssis packages must be deployed.

Parameters.Name: SSIS_Folder
Parameters.Label: SSIS Folder name
Parameters.HelpText: SSIS folder name which is created under SSISDB

Parameters.Name: SSIS_Project
Parameters.Label: Project Name
Parameters.HelpText: SSIS Project name - this is the physical folder name where the OD is referring to .

Parameters.Name: Environment_Name
Parameters.Label: Environment Name
Parameters.HelpText: This is the environment name where variables exists.
